testcases.Subject: question on size_t
testcases.Body: Hi chris, what are the uint_32t and size_t constants? Are these constants predefined in the system?

testcases.Subject: about sifs_mkvolume.c
testcases.Body: Sorry if its a dumb question to ask, but where is the function SIFS_mkvolume() being called from? I tried searching around the internet for the correct library but have no luck finding it?

testcases.Subject: which mode to set file
testcases.Body: If we wanted to change contents of the file with i.e. mkdir, would fopen() need to have mode r+ or w+ or something else?

testcases.Subject: segmentation fault
testcases.Body: In dirinfo, we tried to define *entrynames = entries (which is array of entry names). But when we try to print elements of entryname out, it gives the segmentation error. Anyone know why this happens?

testcases.Subject: data block
testcases.Body: i saw in one of the posts that volume is a file but not a text file so for example in every method along with the path of file or directory we are given with the path of volume so is it a directory?
